About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

It's not about Art. It's about Consciousness

I have always been interested in altered states of consciousness: when it clicks inside, sometimes completely unnoticed, and switches to another mode of functioning. It doesn't matter if you woke up a kundalini, listed to a new track of your favourite musician, were engaged in lucid dreaming or suddenly met your ex on the street: the reality can be very different from the usual.

The impossibility of total control does not mean that one cannot at least try to influence the work of consciousness, unscrew the box in which clever mechanisms are hidden, and then inform the general public of the results of these antiscientific experiments on themselves so that anyone can repeat the same mistakes.
